title: Deal-by-Deal: Ep. 12 - How to Craft an M&A Letter of Intent with Greg Hawver and Jeff Brooker (Pt 1)

media:group.media:title: Deal-by-Deal: Ep. 12 - How to Craft an M&A Letter of Intent with Greg Hawver and Jeff Brooker (Pt 1)
media:group.media:description:
October 4, 2022: When buyers and sellers are unclear on what to include in a Letter of Intent (“LOI”) -- what is binding and what is not, and how to leverage exclusivity -- deals can go sideways. Join hosts Greg Hawver and Jeff Brooker in the first episode of a two-part series as they discuss best practices for M&A deal letters of intent. Gain insight on how to balance desire for exclusivity and what key terms to address to avoid miscommunication.

For more about the series, please visit: https://www.mcguirewoods.com/deal-by-deal

For series playlist, please visit: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIhiURlywxrgIWT4mTKj6sQBu-7749nRx

Videos may include attorney advertising and aren’t legal advice/opinion. Prior successes ≠ future results.
